title: BRIEF-Weedmd Announces $10 Mln Bought Short Form Prospectus Offering Of Convertible Debenture Units
text:
BRIEF-Weedmd Announces $10 Mln Bought Short Form Prospectus Offering Of Convertible Debenture Units

Stock Markets Sep 04, 2019 18:00

© Reuters. BRIEF-Weedmd Announces $10 Mln Bought Short Form Prospectus Offering Of Convertible Debenture Units Sept 4 (Reuters) - WeedMD Inc : * WEEDMD ANNOUNCES $10 MILLION BOUGHT SHORT FORM PROSPECTUS OFFERING OF CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURE UNITS * ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT WITH MACKIE RESEARCH CAPITAL CORPORATION AS LEAD UNDERWRITER AND SOLE BOOKRUNNER * CLOSING OF OFFERING IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR ON OR ABOUT WEEK OF SEPTEMBER 25 * UNDERWRITERS HAVE AGREED TO PURCHASE, ON A BOUGHT-DEAL BASIS, 10,000 CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURE UNITS AT A PRICE OF $1,000 PER DEBENTURE UNIT
